title: Numerical Meth-Finance
description: Basic numerical and simulation techniques used in the pricing of derivative securities and in related problems in finance. Some programming experience required.

__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
